changeMasterCopy(address).details: Allows to upgrade the contract. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

devdoc.title: MasterCopy - Base for master copy contracts (should always be first super contract)         This contract is tightly coupled to our proxy contract (see `proxies/GnosisSafeProxy.sol`)
